docs: Program entrypoint for OrbitFinance.

instructions.name: claim_protocol_fees
docs: Claims protocol fees from fee vaults.

accounts.name: creator_destination
docs: Where creator fees are finally sent (pool creator, DAO treasury, etc.)

accounts.name: holders_destination
docs: Aggregator / distributor for token holders rewards

accounts.name: nft_destination
docs: Aggregator / distributor for NFT holders rewards

instructions.name: close_pool
docs: Closes pool (admin only).

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool PDA (seeded from instruction args)

accounts.name: registry
docs: Registry PDA (close too so you can re-init same pair)

instructions.name: create_liquidity_bin
docs: Creates a new liquidity bin.

instructions.name: deposit_into_bins
docs: Deposits liquidity into specific bins; mints LP shares to the depositor.

accounts.name: depositor
docs: Depositor & LP receiver

instructions.name: init_pool
docs: Initializes a new liquidity pool (state + lp_mint + registry).

accounts.name: admin
docs: Pays for initialization; becomes pool admin (can be rotated later).

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool state account (PDA) - zero_copy for stack efficiency.

accounts.name: registry
docs: Pair registry PDA to prevent duplicate pools.

instructions.name: init_pool_vaults
docs: Initializes the pool’s vault token accounts and writes them into Pool.

accounts.name: admin
docs: Payer for account creations

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool PDA (already initialized by `init_pool`)

accounts.name: base_mint_account
docs: Mint accounts (Anchor will deserialize + owner-check)

instructions.name: lock_liquidity
docs: Locks liquidity metadata.

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool state (PDA) - validated in function body

accounts.name: liquidity_lock
docs: Per-user lock record (PDA) - manually initialized

accounts.name: user
docs: User who owns the lock record

accounts.name: user_lp
docs: User LP account to validate they have enough tokens and transfer from

accounts.name: escrow_lp
docs: Escrow account owned by pool PDA to hold locked LP tokens

instructions.name: set_pause
docs: Pauses or unpauses the pool.

instructions.name: set_pause_bits
docs: Sets pause bits for the pool (pause_guardian only).

instructions.name: swap
docs: Executes a swap against the pool.
matching the internal signature and avoiding the `'1` vs `'2` lifetime clash.

instructions.name: update_admin
docs: Updates the pool admin (admin only).

instructions.name: update_authorities
docs: Updates pool authorities (admin only).

instructions.name: update_fee_config
docs: Updates the pool fee configuration.

instructions.name: withdraw_liquidity
docs: Admin-only withdrawal

instructions.name: withdraw_user
docs: User withdrawal: burns LP shares and returns pro-rata assets.

accounts.name: liquidity_lock
docs: If account doesn't exist, user has no active locks
We use UncheckedAccount and validate manually to handle cases where account doesn't exist

errors.name: InvalidLiquidity
errors.msg: The provided liquidity value is invalid.

errors.name: CalculationError
errors.msg: Calculation error occurred during arithmetic operations.

errors.name: InvalidInput
errors.msg: The provided input data is invalid.

errors.name: InternalInconsistency
errors.msg: Operation aborted due to an internal inconsistency.

errors.name: UnknownError
errors.msg: An unknown error has occurred.

errors.name: SlippageExceeded
errors.msg: The swap operation did not meet the minimum output requirements due to slippage protection.

errors.name: InsufficientLiquidity
errors.msg: The pool does not have sufficient liquidity to perform this operation.

errors.name: UnauthorizedOperation
errors.msg: Unauthorized operation attempted.

errors.name: InvalidAuthority
errors.msg: Invalid or missing protocol authority for this operation.

errors.name: InvalidAccountState
errors.msg: The account state is invalid.

errors.name: MintMismatch
errors.msg: Token account mint does not match expected mint for this pool.

errors.name: OwnerMismatch
errors.msg: Token account owner does not match expected authority.

errors.name: TokenTransferFailed
errors.msg: Token transfer failed to execute correctly.

errors.name: PoolPaused
errors.msg: Pool is currently paused.

errors.name: OperationDisabled
errors.msg: The requested operation is currently disabled.

errors.name: MigrationFailed
errors.msg: Migration failed for this pool account.

errors.name: VersionMismatch
errors.msg: On-chain version mismatch detected.

errors.name: PoolAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Pool already exists for this token pair and configuration.

errors.name: PoolNotFound
errors.msg: Pool not found for the requested token pair and configuration.

errors.name: PairOrderingViolation
errors.msg: Invalid pair ordering; token pair must be canonicalized.

errors.name: RegistryViolation
errors.msg: Pair registry constraint violated.

errors.name: BinAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Liquidity bin already exists for this index.

errors.name: BinNotFound
errors.msg: Liquidity bin not found for the requested index.

errors.name: InvalidBinBounds
errors.msg: Invalid liquidity bin bounds.

errors.name: LPTokenMismatch
errors.msg: LP token mint or account does not match this pool.

errors.name: NotEnoughShares
errors.msg: Not enough LP shares to complete this operation.

errors.name: LPVaultMismatch
errors.msg: LP vault or escrow does not match expected authority.

errors.name: ReentrancyDetected
errors.msg: Reentrancy detected: operation aborted for security reasons.

errors.name: PriceOutOfRange
errors.msg: Initial deposit price deviates from target

errors.name: PoolNotEmpty
errors.msg: Pool reserves must be empty on bootstrap

errors.name: InvalidVaultOwner
errors.msg: Vault is not owned by the SPL Token program

errors.name: InvalidVaultAuthority
errors.msg: Vault has an unexpected authority

errors.name: InvalidVaultMint
errors.msg: Vault has an unexpected mint

errors.name: InvalidVaultData
errors.msg: Account data is too short to be a valid SPL Token account

errors.name: ActiveLock
errors.msg: Liquidity is currently locked and cannot be withdrawn until the lock period expires.

errors.name: InsufficientLP
errors.msg: Insufficient LP tokens for this operation.

errors.name: VaultsAlreadyInitialized
errors.msg: Pool vaults already initialized.

types.name: AdminUpdated
docs: Emitted when the admin rotates to a new key.

types.name: AuthoritiesUpdated
docs: Emitted when auxiliary authorities are updated.

types.name: BinDeposit
docs: Per-bin deposit instruction argument

types.name: BinLiquidityUpdated
docs: Emitted whenever a bin’s reserves change (e.g., deposit or swap traversal).

fields.name: delta_base
docs: Change in base/quote reserve (unsigned magnitudes).

fields.name: reserve_base
docs: Resulting reserves after the change.

types.name: FeeConfig
docs: Fee distribution configuration for the pool.

types.name: FeeConfigUpdated
docs: Emitted whenever the fee configuration is changed.

types.name: FeesDistributed
docs: Emitted when fees are split to fee vaults during swap.

types.name: LiquidityBin
docs: Discrete liquidity bin (price bucket).

fields.name: pool
docs: Owning pool.

fields.name: bin_index
docs: Bin index (PDA uses u64 LE for seeds). Math uses signed i32.

fields.name: lower_bound_q64_64
docs: Optional bounds for analytics / sanity (Q64.64).

fields.name: liquidity
docs: Optional notion of "liquidity units" (for analytics).

fields.name: reserve_base
docs: Actual reserves at this bin's fixed price.

fields.name: fee_growth_base_q128
docs: Cumulative fee growth (per 1 unit of base/quote) in Q128 domain.

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump.

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Padding / future use.

types.name: LiquidityBinCreated
docs: Emitted when a new liquidity bin is created.

fields.name: initial_liquidity
docs: Initial bin liquidity recorded at creation.

types.name: LiquidityDeposited
docs: Emitted when a user deposits liquidity and receives LP shares.

fields.name: shares_minted
docs: LP shares minted to the user (LP mint decimals, typically 9).

types.name: LiquidityLocked
docs: Emitted when a user locks liquidity (book-entry in current code).

types.name: LiquidityWithdrawnAdmin
docs: Emitted when an admin performs a legacy/admin-only withdrawal.

types.name: LiquidityWithdrawnUser
docs: Emitted when a user withdraws by burning LP shares.

types.name: PairRegistered
docs: Emitted if you keep a separate register_pair instruction (factory/registry path).

types.name: PairRegistry
docs: Pair registry to prevent duplicate pools beyond canonical ordering.
PDA seeds: [b"registry", base_mint, quote_mint] (where base_mint < quote_mint)

fields.name: base_mint
docs: Canonical pair (base < quote)

fields.name: pool
docs: Pool address created for this pair.

fields.name: bin_step_bps
docs: Bin step used by this pool (bps).

fields.name: created_at
docs: Creation timestamp.

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed.

fields.name: _reserved
docs: Reserved for future config (e.g., flags).

types.name: PauseUpdated
docs: Emitted when pause bitmask changes.

fields.name: paused
docs: Bitmask of paused features (see state/flags.rs):
PAUSE_SWAP | PAUSE_DEPOSIT | PAUSE_WITHDRAW

types.name: Pool
docs: Main pool account holding configuration, authorities, price cache and vaults.
Fields are ordered to minimize padding for zero-copy compatibility.
Using unsafe Pod/Zeroable impl because #[repr(C)] may add minimal padding
between fields of different alignments, but all fields are Pod-compatible.

types.name: PoolInitialized
docs: Emitted once when a pool is initialized.

types.name: RewardIndexes
docs: Tracks accumulated reward indexes for holders and NFT stakers.

types.name: SwapExecuted
docs: Emitted on each swap execution.

fields.name: total_fee
docs: Total fee charged (token domain depends on direction; commonly quote).

fields.name: price_after_q64_64
docs: Post-swap price marker in Q64.64.
